metadata.title: CVE-2019-12874 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in zlib_decompress_extra in modules/demux/mkv/util.cpp in VideoLAN VLC media player 3.x through 3.0.7. The Matroska demuxer, while parsing a malformed MKV file type, has a double free.

criterions.comment: vlc package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.0.7.1-3').
